beetle.notes: insect sounding - could be used for other insects

giant.notes: giant - no actual fire or frost

gith.notes: Male Githyanki - can probably be used for most humanoids

creatures: Speakers to the Wind (Gnoll Cascade Bearer)

goblin.notes: very aggressive sounding - not very golarion gobliny :D

golmiron.notes: metalic sounding golem - could be used for any metal construct

horror.notes: Metal sounding - more like a haunted item

vale.notes: Male human - a bit higher pitched
